meanings.sent1: The bird had spanless wings, so it couldn't fly far.
meanings.sent2: The airplane had spanless wings, making it unable to take off.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's cape was spanless, causing him to trip over it.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams were like spanless wings, never able to soar high.
meanings.sent5: The kite with spanless wings could only flutter in the breeze.

meanings.definition: Lacking the ability to span or reach across.
meanings.sent1: The broken bridge was spanless, preventing anyone from crossing.
meanings.sent2: The short rope was spanless, unable to reach the other side of the canyon.
meanings.sent3: The magician's wand was spanless, failing to perform any tricks.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship felt spanless, unable to bridge the gap between them.
meanings.sent5: The gap between the buildings was spanless, impossible to jump across.

meanings.definition: Unable to cover a distance or period of time.
meanings.sent1: The spanless car could not complete the race.
meanings.sent2: The spanless clock could not measure the passing hours.
meanings.sent3: His excuses were spanless, unable to justify his actions.
meanings.sent4: The spanless road seemed to stretch on forever.
meanings.sent5: The spanless journey left them stranded in the middle of nowhere.
